name: Buy the Book! Preorder now. In Stock Dec 20th!!!
description:
<font size="6"><font color="ff0000",font face="feast of flesh BB">Zombie Caricatures</font>  

Exaggerations and Infections
Pre-order your copy today!

This book is jammed pack with a gallery of studio zombies, sketchbook section with creepy fun monsters, a step by step tutorial on our process, and a fun little bio on how we got started. Each copy sold here will be signed by both artist. So pick up your copy today.

name: Get Drawn as Zombie!!
description:
GET DRAWN AS A ZOMBIE! Have you or someone you know ever been curious about what your face would look like not only through the eyes of a caricature artist, but as a ZOMBIE? Here's your chance! We would love the opportunity to draw YOU, your spouse, boyfriend, girlfriend, friend, family member, beloved pet, close enemy, etc as part of the massive army of THE UNDEAD! How are they drawn? Our Zombie Caricatures are drawn in FULL COLOR and capture everything from the very top of the head to just below the shoulders (sorry no full body drawings). The charge is $75 per person or Animal. We of course can also draw several faces into one piece of art. Have a large group (5 or more)? Email us for special rates at

Zombiecaricatures@gmail.com

HOW TO SEND PHOTOS After Payment is sent, the next things we need are PHOTOS. When sending photos it's best to send them through

Zombiecaricatures@gmail.com

Please send photos of who you want to be drawn that are high quality shots that clearly show the face(s), straight forward, 3/4's view (not quiet side, not straight forward either) are preferred. We will need a set of QUALITY images from each person in the Zombie Caricature. Below are examples of various references we prefer working from, just click the image to enlarge. We like to see more than one angle or expression. REMEMBER, the better the reference is, the better the Zombie Caricature will turn out. Feel free to contact us if you have any more questions

Zombiecaricatures@gmail.com
